author: Staff Reporter
text:
The final electoral rolls released here on Wednesday by District Collector K. Vivekanandan has a total of 11,56,313 registered voters in the district.

The list includes 90 voters of third gender; 5,65,356 women voters; and 5,90,867 male voters.

During the revision of the draft electoral rolls, 64,818 applications were received.

Of these, 61,748 were accepted and the rest were rejected.The final electoral roll would be displayed in the offices of local bodies, voting booths, and the Collectorate here for verification.
title: 11,56,313 voters in Dharmapuri
